meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: AT THE SCENE -- Witnesses described chaos and carnage, with bodies strewn on subway tracks in the subterranean darkness. PAGE A12
DISRUPTED SUMMIT MEETING -- The bombings abruptly shifted the focus of Group of 8 leaders away from African poverty and global warming to terrorism. PAGE A13
POLITICAL CONSEQUENCES -- There were signs that the bombings could take a toll on Prime Minister Tony Blair, whose backing of the war in Iraq had fed fears of retaliation against Britain. PAGE A13
HEIGHTENED SECURITY -- In the United States, officials elevated the alert for the nation's rail, subway and bus systems. PAGE A10
